title: Tahm kench Release on tuesday?
body:
Usually champions releases on fridays, but i have heard that it is possible, that tahm kench will be released on tuesday.
What do you think about ?
Pls answer me :)

replies.body:
German board but kk listen:

He comes out with 5.13 which will be Tuesday or Thursday I guess (no guarantee) and will as far as it was yet be unlocked in evening on the patch day
Wird etwa 22h nach dem champion spotlight release sein . also champ spolight-patch-tahm kench- guck einfach mal bei Surrender@20 nach da wird bald stehen wann genau der 5.13 patch kommt
